reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous and well-constructed, with vibrant colors that stand out, and appreciate its material quality. The dress flatters curves and hugs them beautifully, with one customer noting it gives amazing cleavage. The fit receives mixed feedback - while some say it fits beautifully, others find it little tight in the chest and too small. The material thickness is also mixed, with some finding it t

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the dress
items.body: LOVE this dress! I want it in every color. Itâ€™s super sexy. Iâ€™m 5â€™1 110lbs and got an extra small. It fit like a glove! Get this dress!!!! Read more
items.author: Call Any Vegetable

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected!!
items.body: Formal events are a constant, in my line of work. I needed a black cocktail dress that not only looked great, but it also has to hold up to excess movement. I have never owned a bandage dress, because they never seemed formal enough for my purposes. Also, I'm a stickler for quality material. This dress did not disappoint!! The material is thick and it does not buckle, bunch, fray or pill. On the model, the dress sits above the knee, but on me it the prefect midi length, making it look more classy. I purchased the small (I'm 5'6', 120 lbs). My 34b bust compliment the top of the dress very well, so I have no need for a bra or nipple covers. I will buy a second one in Black, to have as a back-up, since this dress is considered a "uniform", but I'm not gonna take a change on any other colors because, given the type of "bandage" material, I can see how the fabric could look like it's something is wrong with it. Overall, this is a GREAT dress for the price. Hurry up and get it, before they seller realizes what a gem it is. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit!!!!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Beautiful dress I got a small and buy for 115 pounds his bodycon so it makes you look snatched. Loved it so much Read more
items.author: tanya butts

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Broken and used
items.body: Mine came broken, and Sims to be used, couldn't try it. I hope replacement will come soon as I need it ASAP. Material looks good. Will change my review once receive not a broken one Read more
items.author: Rufina

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Dress
items.body: The dress is very nice but it runs small. I normally wear a small but I would likely need to size up to a medium. The material is thick and holds everything in. The seams appear to be sewn properly and the color is as pictured. Read more
items.author: Emma Montano

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Super tight
items.body: I bought this in a medium. I did not like it at all on me. It was soo tight. I wish I got a lg. I'm about 155 lbs, 5'4, 34C chest, 27 waist (with a little baby belly), and 40 hips. My boobs were SPILLING out of this and they're really not that big lol. It felt like it smooshed my butt in and didn't do much for my belly. So medium fit, but lg prob would've been PERFECT. I tried it on and never wore it again, its still in its packaging and wrapped in the paper lol. I wish I returned it. It is very heavy/durable material! It's great material. I can see this dress looking great on others and the black or red large probably would've looked great on me. The gold just didn't look good with my complexion, either. I look good in gold jewelry, but this just wasn't it for me in any way. I would still recommend this dress even though the color and size was off for me. It's great quality. Read more
items.author: Kira

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get this dress ðŸ’ƒðŸ½
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This dress was a huge success! Iâ€™m 5â€™4 and based on the other reviews I got a size large because my hips are wide. My waist is small tho and I wear a 36B bra. The dress fit perfectly except it was too big on the waist and wasnâ€™t snatching me in. I sewed in 2 inches off the waist on each side and then it was a perfect fit. Iâ€™m glad I did because the medium may have been too tight around my hips. The large gave my hips breathing room so the dress didnâ€™t ride up while I was walking/dancing. Alsoâ€¦ I wore this to an event at a night club. I danced the entire night and was drenched in sweat. This dress did NOT show any sweat stains. The bathroom video shows me at the end of the night all sweaty but no stains on the dress- It was remarkable! Definitely worth the money- Iâ€™m going to buy more colors. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful color and fabric
items.body: Beautiful dress. I got the red color. The color was shiny and amazing. The fabric is thick and hugs your body. I stitched the top a little so itâ€™s not as revealing. Amazing dress Read more
items.author: lovelyhinno

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Evening Bodycon Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Evening Bodycon Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Gold, Silver, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
